placeholder.reportedAgainstPlaceholder: Search, select in 3D or drop an object to set as Reported Against.
placeholder.resolvedByPlaceholder: Search, select in 3D or drop an object to set as Resolved by.
placeholder.contextPlaceholder: Search or drop an object to set as Contexts.

lifecycle.create: Set the Issue(s) to NEW state to indicate you start to work on it.
lifecycle.assign: Set the Issue(s) to PENDING state to allow assignees to work on it.
lifecycle.active: Set the Issue(s) to ACTIVE state to indicate you are working on it.
lifecycle.review: Set the Issue(s) to IN REVIEW state to allow the review of your fix.
lifecycle.closed: Close the issue if everything has been fixed.
lifecycle.error: An error occurred, please refresh your page and retry.
lifecycle.notSupported: Only issues with same maturity state and same validation process can be promoted or demoted.

inProgressTooltip.title: Waiting approval from:
inProgressTooltip.multiSelectionTitle: The selected issues are waiting approvals from multiple reviewers.

approveModal.actionPlaceholder: Specify some action to be done...

rejectModal.header: Reject promotion to {approveTo} state and demote to {rejectTo}.
rejectModal.actionPlaceholder: Specify some action to be done...

paths.anyStateToClose: Allow close from any state by the issue owner.

create.title: issue(s)
create.templateApplyError: An error occurred when applying template '{name}'.
create.templateApplyWarningAttachments: Some attachments referenced by the template do not exist anymore. They could not be added.
create.issueApplyError: An error occurred when applying issue '{title} - {name}'.
create.required: Required field must not be empty.
create.creationFailed: An error occurred during the creation, please retry again.
create.validationFailed: Some fields are not properly filled.
create.promotionFailed: An error occurred during the promotion.
create.uploadImagesFailed: An error occurred during the upload of images.

labels.title: Title
labels.titleHelper: A brief one-line summary of the issue.
labels.similarIssuesHelper: These existing issues have a similar title. It might be better to comment there instead of creating another similar issue.
labels.descriptionHelper: A detailed description of the issue. A set of ready to use rich-text features are available.
labels.resolutionRecommendationHelper: A recommendation to explain how this issue should be fixed.
labels.priorityHelper: The importance of the issue in relation to other issues.
labels.priorityHelperUrgent: Urgent: Highest priority. Indicates that this issue takes precedence over all others.
labels.priorityHelperHigh: High: Indicates that this issue is causing a problem and requires urgent attention.
labels.priorityHelperMedium: Medium: Indicates that this issue has a significant impact.
labels.priorityHelperLow: Low: Indicates that this issue has a relatively minor impact.
labels.dueDateHelper: The date by which this issue should be completed.

labels.reportedAgainstHelper: This relationship is used to link any objects to an issue, in order to identify them as 'faulty'. For example, it can be a 3D object, a document...
labels.reportedAgainstPlaceholder: Search, select in 3D or drop an object to set as Reported Against.
labels.contextHelper: Also called DMU Context, it is used to attach one object to the issue, for a better understanding of the issue. It can be another 3D object with a bigger structure, to be able to see the full context of an issue.
labels.contextPlaceholder: Search or drop an object to set as Context.

related.removeErrorNoSelection: Please select some objects to be removed.
related.addBalloonAvailable: Pick a precise element in the 3D to add it to the Issue.
related.addBalloonNotAvailable: Pick in 3D feature is only available from 'Issue 3D Review'.
related.alreadyReportedAgainst: This object has already been added, please select another one.
related.dropError: The dropped objects are not supported.
related.selectContextIn3D: Pick a precise element in the 3D to select context for the Issue.
related.contextMultiError: Adding multiple objects in context is not supported.

labels.ownerHelper: This relationship allows you to set the person who owns the issue, giving them all access rights.
labels.coOwnersHelper: This relationship allows you to add co-owner to the issue, giving them same access rights as the main owner.
labels.assigneesHelper: This relationship allows you to assign people to the issue (can be several). The person will now be able to see this issue in their list, and start to work on it.
labels.responsibleOrganizationHelper: Set the organization responsible of this issue (automatically populated once reported against is added).

team.cannotAddOwnerAsCoOwner: You cannot add the owner as a co-owner.

labels.attachmentsHelper: Attachments can provide more insight regarding the content of the issue. They can be files of any kind, existing 3DEXPERIENCE objects or annotated screenshots of the Issue 3D Review app.
labels.attachmentsPlaceholder: Upload/drop a file, search/drop a 3DEXPERIENCE object or take an annotated screenshot button to create and add a new attachment.
labels.attachmentsPlaceholderNotAvailable: Upload/drop a file or search/drop a 3DEXPERIENCE object to create and add a new attachment.

attachments.screenshotNotAvailable: Screenshot feature is only available from 'Issue 3D Review'.
attachments.removeErrorNoSelection: Please select some documents to be removed.

labels.templateOverwrite: An existing Template with same name will be overwritten.

finalize.promoteToAssignToggle: Promote the issue directly to 'Pending' state.
finalize.enableApproval: Enable the approval to ensure validation and review of this issue.
finalize.saveAsTemplateToggle: Save the form as a reusable template.

shared.title: Issue shared template - {owner}
shared.description: This document contains an issue shared template.

confirmDelete.title: Deleting {number} template(s)
confirmDelete.text: Are you sure you want to delete the selected template(s)? It will remove them permanently and cannot be undone.
confirmDelete.sharedInfo: The shared template(s) that you don't owned will be removed only from your list.
confirmDelete.sharedWarning: The shared template(s) that you owned will be removed from all users.

errors.get: An error occurred when retrieving templates, please refresh your page and retry.
errors.remove: An error occurred when removing templates, please refresh your page and retry.
errors.save: An error occurred when saving templates, please refresh your page and retry.

notifications.sharedSuccess: This template has been shared, and a shareable URL has been generated.
notifications.sharedTemplateAdded: A shared template has been successfully added to your template list.
notifications.sharedTemplateNotValid: This shared template is not valid anymore. It has not been added to your template list.
notifications.sharedTemplateAlreadyAdded: This shared template is already in your template list.
notifications.sharedTemplateNotAdded: An error occurred while adding the shared template, please refresh your page and retry.
notifications.sharedTemplateURL: The shared template URL has been copied to your clipboard.

labels.nothing: Nothing to open, please select another object.

open.error: An error occurred while opening the selected object(s), please refresh and retry.

close.title: Closing {number} Issues(s)
close.nothing: There are no issues to close.
close.warning: Are you sure you want to close these issues?
close.closable: Closing the following issue(s) will prevent any modification, unless reopened:
close.indelible: The following issue(s) are already closed:
close.error: An error occurred during the closure, please retry.

delete.title: Deleting {number} Issues(s)
delete.nothing: There are no issues to delete.
delete.warning: Are you sure you want to delete this content?
delete.deletable: Deleting the following issue(s) will remove them permanently and cannot be undone:
delete.indelible: The following issue(s) cannot be deleted, they are not in 'New' state:
delete.error: An error occurred during the deletion, please retry.

duplicate.title: Duplicate {number} issues(s).
duplicate.content: The following issue(s) will be duplicated (the duplicated issue(s) will be under your ownership in 'New' state):
duplicate.error: An error occurred during the duplication, please retry.
duplicate.keepAttachments: Keep existing attachments in duplicated issues
duplicate.replaceHelp: Provide part of title to be replaced as a string or regular expression followed by string to be replaced with. Both parts will be separated by :. e.g. [a-z]*:Test will replace all small case strings in title with Test
duplicate.suffixHelp: Provide string to suffix Title of duplicated issues
duplicate.prefixHelp: Provide string to prefix Title of duplicated issues
duplicate.iteratorHelp: Provide the part of title to be incremented after duplication as string or regular expression. Numeric part will be incremented

images.title: {count} Image(s)

delete.confirmDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this image?

images.notSupported:

states.assign: Requestor assigned the issue, to allow assignees to work on it.
states.active: Issue is being worked on by the assignees.
states.review: The proposed solution is being reviewed by the issue creator.
states.closed: Solution is accepted by the creator and the issue is closed.

states.assign: Requestor assigned the issue, to allow assignees to work on it.
states.active: Issue is being worked on by the assignees.
states.review: The proposed solution is being reviewed by the issue creator.
states.closed: Solution is accepted by the creator and the issue is closed.

mouse.ctrlClick: Select multiple items that you click/Unselect
mouse.shiftClick: Select all items in between your click
